name: Seville Plaza Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description:
This Kansas City hotel is less than 0.9 mi from the Country Club Plaza. The hotel offers free WiFi, free on-site parking and a gym.
Seville Plaza Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham.  Hotel features cable TV and free local calls under 30 minutes in every guest room. Rooms are also equipped with a coffee maker and ironing facilities.
The nonsmoking Seville Plaza Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham. Plus serves a continental breakfast every morning. A business center is also available.
St. Luke's Hospital is within a 10-minute walk of Seville Plaza Hotel, Trademark Collection by Wyndham. . The University of Missouri Kansas City is within a 12-minute drive of the hotel.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City Beacon Hill
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City Beacon Hill! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Featuring 3-star accommodations, La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City Beacon Hill is located in Kansas City, a 19-minute walk from Union Station Kansas City and 1.5 miles from Sprint Center. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and luggage storage for guests.
At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room has a flat-screen TV, and certain units at La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City Beacon Hill have a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.
The accommodation offers a buffet or American breakfast.
National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 1.6 miles from La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City Beacon Hill, while Kansas City Convention Center is 1.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.title: Nice place in Kansas City, MO
userReviews.positive: The best feature was the location. Situated right off 71 there is no trouble finding the hotel. Getting around the city is also very easy if you have a car. There are many restaurants located close to the hotel (5 - 10 minute drive w/ free street parking in the neighborhoods behind the main streets), which make finding a place to grab dinner very easy. The room itself was comfortable and offered some nice views of the sky-line. Overall everything was clean, and orderly, and the staff was above friendly and although managing a very busy hotel took time to speak to guests about anything they needed from room issues, to good places to eat near by. Pets are allowed for an extra cost.
userReviews.negative: Things that could have been better: the windows while a thick piece of glass, did allow quite a bit of street noise into the room. In addition the door on the bathroom would not latch fully, as such that could be an issue for some. While the hotel is a smoke free facility, there was a smoking section right outside of the main door, that was not a pleasant place to walk through to and from the building. Finally, the water pressure in the shower was very low.
userReviews.room: King Room with City View - Non-Smoking

name: The Truitt
description:
Located in Kansas City, 2.8 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial, The Truitt has accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At The Truitt the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Union Station Kansas City is 3.3 miles from the accommodation, while Sprint Center is 3.8 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 22 miles from The Truitt.

address.full: 4320 Oak Street, Kansas City, MO 64111, United States of America

userReviews.title: The Truitt is a very lovely old home with many well appointed touches.
userReviews.positive: Thanks for the water, chocolates , expresso and mandelines....we enjoyed them very much.
userReviews.negative: Not the fault of the host, but finding the parking area in back was a little difficult.  We circled the block several times before we located the back entrance.

userReviews.title: Our time at Truitt Boutique Hotel was delightful!
userReviews.positive: The hotel is located in a very pleasant and pretty location, very close to museums and parks. The mansion itself, is absolutely beautiful, peaceful, and comfortable.   Ryan was amazing in providing  information and tips to match our interests and needs. He upgraded us to a suite.  We will go back as soon as we can .
userReviews.negative: Everything was pretty close to perfect.

userReviews.title: Historic, unique and delightful boutique hotel
userReviews.positive: Very stylish decor, great bedding, clean and smelled wonderful.
userReviews.negative: While the carriage house was fantastic, we'd like to stay in the main dwelling next time.

userReviews.title: Wonderful and comfortable KC retreat.
userReviews.positive:
I'd never been to Kansas City and hoped the neighborhood was nice. It was the BEST! I loved the area, and its proximity to great restaurants and beautiful architecture. I also arrived dog tired from a long flight, and slept 10 hours, uninterrupted in a comfy bed with dark and quiet all around. 
What I liked best, though, was Ryan and David, who run the place. They were super responsive to the details that I thought needed fixing (described below), and I have every confidence that the next time I go there, things will be even better. It was also a sweet gesture to find a box of chocolates and note on the bed upon my arrival. 
Oh, and that shower is wonderful!
userReviews.negative: The hosts need to (and said they will) fix the curtains so they're easier to move, and let in more light. They'll also put a light in the hallway because it was a little hard to see the keypad for my room. But I only speak about my first floor room; the second floor looks very bright and airy.

userReviews.title: I am so glad we stayed at The Truitt and I will definitely be back again next time I’m in KCMO!
userReviews.positive:
This location is perfect. It’s in the museum/arts district, walking distance from The Plaza and Hyde Park. The interior design aesthetic is lovely and you can tell the owners thoughtfully planned every detail. Bonus: the mattress was the most comfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on! I want to buy one for my own home. 
The contactless check in was a breeze, because the owners sent a comprehensive email with the codes for both the main property and the building where my room was located. They also kindly upgraded me to a king suite when we chatted about payment. I really appreciated that!
userReviews.negative: Incredibly minor, but I only wish there had been a hook for a hand towel next to the sink.

userReviews.negative: The price was a little high for one night. However it was still well worth the stay.

userReviews.title: Felt so fancy & really glad I booked her instead of the generic work recommended location
userReviews.positive:
It was beautifully decorated, the lobby ambiance was great with the music and scent. Thoughtful amenities everywhere. Great snack selection in the room. It was a luxurious experience. 
Also, it was contactless so I never saw the staff but every email or call was answered quickly so I had no problems.
userReviews.negative: It’s an older building so the floorboards were loud all over and you could hear street noise and dogs from the next building HOWEVER they had a sound machine in the room and I used that and slept through the night with no issues. I didn’t see it for my quick snooze at 4pm so sirens & dogs woke me up.

userReviews.title: You'll never find a better place in KC!
userReviews.positive: It's literally the best place to stay in KC! Ryan is always super friendly and helpful. The beds and bathrooms are my absolute favorite part. Those sheets are so freaking comfortable, and their showers make me so jealous 😂 Oh my goodness, I love everything about this place.
userReviews.negative: It's not really a dislike, but just note: no fridge in room or laundry on site. They do put in their note to ask if you need to store something, but I'm not sure if that means refrigeration or laundry, too. We've never had to ask. Parking can be a tight squeeze, but they outline all your options, too, so it should be okay. Just FYI, in case you're in a bigger vehicle. Seriously though, no complaints at all from me.

userReviews.title: Trendy & sophisticated boutique experience on a budget
userReviews.positive: The Truitt is a beautiful and extremely well-thought-out lodging experience. Situated in a quiet area very close to the Kansas City action, it has everything you need to feel like you’re living in the lap of luxury without breaking the bank. Honestly couldn’t believe the price I was paying for such a unique and immaculate stay. And that’s not even the best part. The management was incredibly hospitable and very communicative throughout the process, making sure I had everything I needed for my stay. Top notch all around.

name: AC Hotel Kansas City Plaza
description:
AC Hotel by Marriott Kansas City Westport is located 2 mi from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. Free WiFi access is available and rooms come equipped with a flat-screen cable TV.
All rooms feature a seating area. A hairdryer is offered in the private bathroom.
The free shuttle service offers guests a ride to nearby popular sites including the Sprint Center. A 24-hour front desk and a bar are also available on site. The hotel also offers luggage storage and a vending machine. Reservations include free parking.
The hotel is 3.2 mi from Sprint Center and 3.2 mi from Kansas City Convention Center. Kansas City International Airport is 18 mi away.

address.full: 560 Westport Road, Kansas City, MO 64111, United States of America

name: Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City Downtown
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodations, Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City Downtown is located in Kansas City, 1.3 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial and 1.8 miles from Union Station Kansas City. This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site.
With a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a city view. At Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City Downtown rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV.
Sprint Center is 2.8 miles from the accommodation, while Kansas City Convention Center is 2.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 20 miles from Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City Downtown.

userReviews.negative: The facility needed some cleaning or needed to look more organized. It didn't feel like a clean hotel, not saying the hotel was really dirty or disgusting. I could tell the hotel was remodeled recently but at the same time you can tell it was old and needed some repairs. Like it was remodeled in the most cheap way they could afford to do it. The showers need to have a different design. There's no tub or anything to enclose the water from staying in the shower area. The whole bathroom floor is flat with no elevation, so the shower water splashes and spreads around nearly all of the bathroom floor. In short, it felt like we stayed at a really cheap hotel for what we paid for, but it was still decent hotel just to sleep at.

name: Midtown Inn & Suites
description:
Located 3 miles from the University of Missouri, this Kansas City hotel features an outdoor pool. Rooms at Midtown Inn & Suites offer free Wi-Fi and cable TV with HBO.
Each guest room provides a desk and coffee maker. The rooms also include hairdryers and ironing facilities.
Midtown Inn & Suites serves grab and go breakfast. For guests’ convenience, the hotel offers a business center, laundry facilities and 24-hour front desk.
The National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is less than one mile from Midtown Inn & Suites. The hotel is 2 miles from Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art and 8 miles from Kansas City Zoo.

userReviews.title: I was not pleased with the mixup at arrival, but I understand that unforseen problems can happen.
userReviews.positive: I stayed at the half-way point of my outgoing trip and on the return trip 6 days later.  My navigator took me to the location but I had trouble zeroing in on the exact building.  The location was not identified well enough to find the building.  I finally located the building only to learn that they couldn't identify that I had reservations.  I had paid 2 months in advance so there would be no problems upon arrival. I then called them the day before I was to arrive to insure everything was locked in and was told that my reservation was secured.  After about an hour I agreed to paid for the room, again, so I could get much needed sleep.  The next morning, after a good rest, I contacted booking.com and the kind customer support lady called the motel and was able to get everything straightened out.  On the return trip I was able to drive straight to the motel and checkin went fine.  I did have to change rooms due to an unforseen problem but that went easy enough.

There was also a large sticky spot on the carpet between the beds. I shutter to think what it was. Disappointed overall.

name: Hotel Indigo - Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Kansas City and with Kansas City Convention Center reachable within a 4-minute walk, Hotel Indigo - Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
The rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms at Hotel Indigo - Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk.
The accommodation offers an à la carte or American breakfast.
The area is popular for cycling, and car rental is available at this 3-star hotel.
Guests can use the business center or relax in the bar.
Popular points of interest near Hotel Indigo - Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel include Sprint Center, Union Station Kansas City and Historic Power and Light Building. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 17 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.title: Fantastic stay for work.  Very Clean and friendly staff
userReviews.positive: Traveling for work, my first time visiting Kansas City, and staying with Hotel Indigo. I booked a King room which was very clean and comfortable, with a large bathroom which was very clean as well.   The restaurant inside had a great selection of breakfast items which were very well prepared and affordable.  Shortly after I checked in and was settled into my room, I received a text message asking how my room accommodations were and if they met my expectations.  I would receive a text message each day once the cleaning staff cleaned my room, which I found very nice.

name: Kansas City Marriott Downtown
description:
Connected to the KC Convention Center via enclosed walkway, Kansas City Marriott Downtown offers rooms with a flat-screen TV. The indoor rooftop pool features expansive views of the city. There is also a fitness center on site.
The air-conditioned rooms of Marriott Downtown Kansas City are decorated with warm colors. All rooms have a work desk, coffee and tea making facilities, and granite bathrooms. Room service is available.
Guests can choose from a wide range of dining options, including gourmet American cuisine at Metropolitan KC Restaurant. The Coffee Kiosk serves specialty coffees, breakfast items, sandwiches and salads..
Kansas City Marriott Downtown also offers dry cleaning facilities, a gift shop, and a concierge service.
Kansas City Marriott is located less than a 5-minute walk from the Lyric Opera, the Music Hall, the Midland Theater, and Bartle Convention Center.

name: 21c Museum Hotel Kansas City
description:
Located in Kansas City and with Kansas City Convention Center reachable within a 7-minute walk, 21c Museum Hotel Kansas City provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property has a business center, and luggage storage for guests.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a closet, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At 21c Museum Hotel Kansas City every room has bed linen and towels.
An à la carte, American or vegetarian breakfast is served at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Vegan, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.
Popular points of interest near 21c Museum Hotel Kansas City include Sprint Center, Historic Power and Light Building and Bartle Hall Convention Center. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 17 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.title: Unique, charming
userReviews.positive: The location is in a walkable area of downtown Kansas City. Parking is the only downside, as it’s either street or paid parking garage. The staff was incredibly nice, the hotel is very unique and doesn’t feel like a conventional “chain hotel”. The room we had was small but I don’t mind because we were out doing things during the day. I have booked numerous higher end hotels in KC and this is the first one to actually feel worth the price! There’s an art museum in the hotel, as well as the Savoy which is an excellent bar with friendly servers.
userReviews.negative: the air conditioning also kept shutting off in the night which wasn’t too bad being that it’s mid October, but could be an issue in summer.

userReviews.title: Beautiful artsy, upscale hotel
userReviews.positive: The hotel is absolutely beautiful. So much art all around. I loved that they kept many of the original features of the old Savoy hotel like stair railings, paneled doors, windows, etc. This hotel is a perfect blend of an old classic building with a beautiful modern twist. The location is great, right smack in downtown near many bus and rail lines. Public transportation is free in Kansas City and we saved a ton of money by choosing to ride the bus instead of using Uber or Lyft everywhere.
userReviews.negative:
While the majority of the staff were friendly, helpful, and professional, we did experience a couple of staff members at the front desk who were obviously in a bad mood or having a bad day and it showed. 
Also, we had arranged to have our room cleaned on a day where we were out exploring the city all day. When we got back to the room, we were a hot, tired, sweaty mess and the room had not been touched. Bed was still unmade, trash had not been thrown out, and worst of all, no fresh towels in the bathroom. Luckily we were able to secure some clean towels after a quick midnight visit to the front desk.

name: Crowne Plaza Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Next to the Bartle Hall Convention Center in the Power & Light Entertainment District in central Kansas City, Missouri, this hotel offers guest rooms with free high-speed internet access.
Crowne Plaza Hotel Kansas City Downtown features an outdoor, heated pool and on-site fitness center. After a busy day, guests can enjoy a meal at the hotel's City Grille or relax with a drink at the bar.
The guest rooms at the Kansas City Downtown Crowne Plaza offer flat-screen TVs and spacious work areas. Guests can order a meal from room service, then get a restful night's sleep in the comfortable bed with upgraded linens.

name: Hotel Phillips Kansas City, Curio Collection By Hilton
description:
This Kansas City hotel offers free cable TV and WiFi, on-site dining and a 24-hour gym. It is one mile from both the Riverfront Park and the National World War I Museum.
Each room at the Hotel Phillips has a desk for guest use. Other amenities include a coffee maker, hair dryer and ironing facilities.
A business center and meeting rooms are available to guests of the Phillips Hotel. The hotel offers massages and provides valet parking. Room service is also available.
Guests can enjoy coffee at Kilo Charlie Coffee Bar or dine at Tavernonna Italian Kitchen for breakfast, lunch and dinner. P.S., a speakeasy-style cocktail bar, offers guests drinks and small bites.
Hotel Phillips is 9 miles from both the Kansas City Zoo and Midwest Worlds of Fun amusement park. It is 15 miles from the Kansas City International Airport.

name: Hotel Kansas City, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description:
Located a 3-minute walk from Kansas City Convention Center, Hotel Kansas City, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers 4-star accommodations in Kansas City and features a bar. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and an ATM for guests.
At the hotel, each room has a closet. Guest rooms in Hotel Kansas City, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.
The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.
You can play pool at this 4-star hotel.
Popular points of interest near Hotel Kansas City, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt include Sprint Center, Union Station Kansas City and Historic Power and Light Building. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 17 miles from the hotel.

name: Hilton President Kansas City
description:
Set in the heart of downtown Kansas City, across from the H&R Block World Headquarters, this restored historic hotel provides spacious and comfortable accommodations along with many modern amenities.
Within walking distance of the Hilton President Kansas City, guests can visit the Convention Center, the business and financial district and the city's theater district. A number of shopping centers, restaurants and exciting nightlife can also be found nearby.
The Kansas City President Hilton boasts spacious and versatile meeting and banquet space along with wireless internet access. Guestrooms at the hotel are furnished with signature Sweet Dreams beds and MP3 compatible radios.

userReviews.room: Double Room with Two Double Beds and Bathtub

userReviews.title: Good
userReviews.positive: The facility is in a very convenient location. Within walking distance to food & entertainment. The room did not have the same fragrance in the lobby, which would have been a deal breaker! The furniture & bed were comfortable. The ladies at the desk during check-in/check were both super thorough, fast/efficient & nice, despite the long lines.
userReviews.negative:
There is no way to register your vehicle through guest parking online, even if the room is purchased online. Furthermore, there is nowhere to park prior to checking in. Guests have to circle the block multiple times to compete with extremely limited street parking. When attempting to park & find my way into the building, one outside staff member was very unhelpful. The man was sweeping & just kept repeating where I couldn't park, but couldn't seem to give basic information when asked where I could park or where the building entrance was. 
Once inside the lobby, the scent/odor (meant to be pleasant) was overwhelmingly noxious! I do NOT have asthma, but experienced bronchial spasms & felt like my airway was chemically irritated by the overpowering concentration of fragrance in the air. I was concerned the room would be the same & did develop a mild headache. Thankfully, the room air smelt fine. There are no room refrigerators or food vending machines on each floor, only one small food display @ lobby check/in desk/shop. Room clock & one lamp didn't work. For the price of the room, guests should not have to pay $10/night for WiFi. This is typically a free amenity at most nice hotels/resorts. In addition, the bandwidth & strength of the network service offered was very weak. Some of the room/facility policies I read online, ie. the cancelation policy, seem unethical & very business/profit centered. Overall the experience of my stay felt  impersonal. The only welcoming part was while communicating with the lady who proceeded my check- out!

name: Fairfield Inn Kansas City Downtown/Union Hill
description:
This hotel is located 2 miles from the Sprint Center Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. The Fairfield Inn provides a daily breakfast buffet and rooms with free Wi-Fi.
Rooms at the Fairfield Inn Kansas City Downtown/Union Hill come furnished with cable TVs and work desks. Each room comes equipped with a seating area and tea/coffee maker.
Guests at the Downtown Kansas City Fairfield Inn can work out in the gym or work in the business center. The hotel features an indoor pool.
The Fairfield Inn is just one block from Penn Valley Park, offering a baseball field, tennis court and skate park. The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art is a 6-minute drive from the Union Hill Fairfield.

name: Loews Kansas City
description:
Located in Kansas City, a 6-minute walk from Kansas City Convention Center, Loews Kansas City provides accommodations with a fitness center, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an indoor pool, hot tub and an ATM.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Loews Kansas City all rooms come with bed linen and towels.
There's an on-site bar and guests can also use the business area.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sprint Center, Union Station Kansas City and Historic Power and Light Building. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 17 miles from Loews Kansas City.

address.full: 1515 Wyandotte Street, Kansas City, MO 64108, United States of America

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center
description:
With Sprint Center reachable in a 6-minute walk, Residence Inn by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center provides accommodations, a restaurant, free bikes, a fitness center and a shared lounge. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site.
Some of the units include cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.
A buffet, American or vegetarian breakfast is served at the property.
The condo hotel offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool. There's an on-site bar and guests can also use the business area.
Popular points of interest near Residence Inn by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center include Kansas City Convention Center, Union Station Kansas City and National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from the accommodation.

name: Crossroads Hotel
description:
Located a 16-minute walk from Sprint Center, Crossroads Hotel offers 4-star accommodations in Kansas City and has a shared lounge, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a fitness center, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.
The rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Crossroads Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels.
An à la carte, continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.
You can play pool at this 4-star hotel.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kansas City Convention Center, Union Station Kansas City and National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from Crossroads Hotel.

address.full: 2101 Central Street, Kansas City, MO 64108, United States of America

name: Courtyard by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center
description:
Located in Kansas City, a 5-minute walk from Sprint Center, Courtyard by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center provides accommodations with a fitness center, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
À la carte and American breakfast options are available daily at the hotel.
Courtyard by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool.
There's an on-site bar and guests can also use the business area.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kansas City Convention Center, Union Station Kansas City and National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from Courtyard by Marriott Kansas City Downtown/Convention Center.

name: Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads is located in Kansas City, a 5-minute walk from Sprint Center and half a mile from Kansas City Convention Center. Featuring a fitness center, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy American dishes at the restaurant or have a drink at the snack bar.
At the hotel, all rooms come with a closet. Rooms contain a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads have a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels.
Guests at Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. The reception at Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads can provide tips on the area.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Union Station Kansas City, National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial and Historic Power and Light Building. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from Hampton Inn Suites Kansas City Downtown Crossroads.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Kansas City Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express - Kansas City Downtown is located in Kansas City, 1,000 feet from Sprint Center and 2,650 feet from Kansas City Convention Center. The City Hall is within a 3-minute walk.
All rooms feature a microwave, coffee maker and flat-screen TV. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom. A fridge is also included.
A free buffet breakfast is served daily, and fitness facilities are available. The hotel also has an on-site business center.
Kauffman Center for Performing Arts is 0.7 mi from Holiday Inn Express - Kansas City D, while the Legoland at Discovery Center is within a 5-minute drive. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 21 mi from the property.

name: Home2 Suites Kansas City Downtown
description:
Located in Kansas City, Home2 Suites Kansas City Downtown provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property is around a 17-minute walk from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial, 7.2 miles from Kauffman Stadium and 10 miles from Worlds of Fun. The hotel features an indoor pool, fitness center and a 24-hour front desk.
The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Sprint Center, Union Station Kansas City and Kansas City Convention Center. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from Home2 Suites Kansas City Downtown.

userReviews.title: Comfortable, nice staff but a tad expensive and also needing a detailed eye towards maintenance
userReviews.positive: The location was great if you want to live downtown. Next to the Main Street tramline. The parking space was unexpectedly huge for a downtown hotel - almost as big as a suburban strip mall parking lot but secure. The hotel staff was considerate enough to forgive a non-refundable booking I made by mistake at a later date. The breakfast staff made sure you were supplied with different options for hot breakfast (a good one). Their beds and pillows are always the best.
userReviews.negative: I had higher expectations having been in a Home2 Suite before in Dallas. This one showed signs of aging and lack of a detailed eye for maintenance. Our lamp was acting up (a plug point popped out creating a risk for electrocution). In the process of trying to rectify it (a piece of tape was what I suggested because I did not want to be difficult), the entire bank on one side of the room went dark with our phones etc left uncharged because of some electrical shorting. The friendly maintenance guy did try to take care of us within his means. The shower soap dispenser popped out while trying to use it. The shower door has become scuffed and discolored with lack of repainting. This was an expensive Home2 Suite (maybe the inflation price shock to some degree IDK) but my high level of expectations were set by my earlier stay in a Home2 Suite at a much moderate price.

name: Hotel Indigo Kansas City - The Crossroads, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Kansas City, a 12-minute walk from Sprint Center, Hotel Indigo Kansas City - The Crossroads, an IHG Hotel provides accommodations with a fitness center, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. Guests can use a bar.
The hotel offers an à la carte or American breakfast.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Hotel Indigo Kansas City - The Crossroads, an IHG Hotel.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Union Station Kansas City, Kansas City Convention Center and National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 18 miles from Hotel Indigo Kansas City - The Crossroads, an IHG Hotel.

name: The Westin Kansas City at Crown Center
description:
Located in Hallmark's Crown Center, The Westin Crown Center, Kansas City offers easy access to 85 acres of shops, restaurants, and theaters.
A seating area, work desk and flat-screen TV are provided in each room at The Westin Crown Center Hotel. Some rooms feature views of the city.
The Westin Crown Center Hotel features plenty of activities to help guests relax and revive, including a whirlpool, sauna, steam room, outdoor heated swimming pool, and track, as well as tennis courts.
Guests of this Kansas hotel will be just moments away from local attractions such as the Liberty Memorial, Union Station, Bartle Hall Convention Center, museums, and professional sports.

We were just in Europe for several weeks (some Marriott properties too) and every day we had full service and that's what we pay for.  For $250 +taxes equaling $300 per night, I feel as thought the least service you can provide is making up the bed and fresh towels.  Service industry is definitely not servicing up to expectations. Your property doesn't deserve 4 stars!

name: Sheraton Kansas City Hotel at Crown Center
description:
Linked by a walkway to Crown Center, this hotel is in Kansas City’s Crossroads Arts District.  It features on-site dining, an outdoor pool and nonsmoking rooms with flat-screen TVs.
An iPod docking station and a work desk are provided in each room at Sheraton Kansas City Hotel at Crown Center.  The modern rooms also include a small fridge for convenience.
Guests at the Kansas City Sheraton can workout in the fitness center or work in the business center.  Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. A complimentary shuttle is offered to local businesses and entertainment. Spectators, the on-site restaurant, offers a casual atmosphere with food and craft beers.
This hotel is within 5 minutes’ walk of the National World War I Museum and Washington Square Park. Union Station is 5 minutes' drive from the accommodations.  Several restaurants and shopping choices are all nearby.

userReviews.title: We had a total of four rooms and everyone had a really great time and experience!!
userReviews.positive: Loved the size of the rooms, the bed was extremely comfortable and the bathrooms and floors were clean. The staff from valet, to check in, housekeeping, check out were extremely helpful and very friendly considering there were hundreds of guests on site for various activities and not all were pleasant.  The views of the city were absolutely beautiful at night! Very relaxing. All in all, I would highly recommend the Sheraton as “THE” place to stay for business or pleasure as they live up to the hype in my opinion!
userReviews.negative: The pillows on the beds are not comfortable. They’re too thin and soft once you lie down on them. Upon first glance, they look so comfortable. But, once you lie down, it’s not as comfortable as it should be. The toilets are really low. I’m almost 6 feet tall, and I felt like I was close to the floor once I got close to the seat. The children needed no help of course because it was at the perfect height. The elevators were a bit slow, but that was probably not the fault of the hotel since there were so many guests and children going up and down.  There were also a lot of inconsiderate guests allowing the room doors to slam shut in the evening which made it a bit difficult to keep a baby asleep.

name: Best Western Country Inn - North
description:
This Kansas City, Missouri hotel is an 8-minute drive from Harrah’s Casino and Maple Creek Golf Course. It features spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and serves a daily continental breakfast.
A microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker are standard in every room at the Best Western Country Inn North.  All rooms are warmly decorated and include a cable TV and work desk.
Guests of the Best Western Country Inn North can enjoy free access to business center and there is free parking is available on-site.
Worlds of Fun Theme Park and Oceans of Fun Water Park are both 4 miles from the hotel.

name: Courtyard Kansas City at Briarcliff
description:
Just a 10 minute drive from The Sprint Center and the heart of downtown Kansas City, this Missouri hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. An indoor swimming pool and hot tub are on site.
All the rooms at Courtyard Kansas City at Briarcliff come with an iPod docking station and a work desk. Every spacious room includes tea and coffee-making facilities.
On-site amenities at Briarcliff Courtyard Kansas City include a business center and a fitness center. A laundromat and a 24-hour front desk are also available.
The Bistro, restaurant and bar, offers fresh, healthy options for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
The Kansas City Downtown Airport is less than 4 miles from this hotel. Kansas Speedway is a 22 minute drive away.

name: Argosy Casino Hotel & Spa
description:
Featuring an on-site casino and restaurant, Argosy Casino Hotel & Spa is in Riverside. Wi-Fi access is available and rooms include cable TV and a sitting area.
A refrigerator and coffee machine are available in the dining area of every room. Featuring a hairdryer, the private bathroom includes a bathtub or shower.
A state-of-the-art fitness center and full-service spa are featured at Argosy. Breakfast is available at varying rates throughout the week. Other facilities available at the property include meeting facilities, luggage storage and dry cleaning. The property provides free parking.
Downtown Kansas City is 3 miles from the property. Historic Power and Light Building is 5 miles away.

name: TownePlace Suites Kansas City At Briarcliff
description:
TownePlace Suites Kansas City At Briarcliff is a sustainable condo hotel in Kansas City, 5.6 miles from Kansas City Convention Center. This property encourages guests to embrace nature with its eco-friendly arrangements. The 3-star condo hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free Wifi. There's parking on-site and the property features an an electric vehicle charging station.
A buffet, continental, or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.
Sprint Center is 5.8 miles from the condo hotel, while Union Station Kansas City is 6.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 12 miles from TownePlace Suites Kansas City At Briarcliff.

name: Hotel Lotus
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodations, Hotel Lotus is located in Kansas City, a 14-minute walk from Kauffman Stadium and 7 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.
At the hotel, rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Lotus all rooms have bed linen and towels.
Buffet and American breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.
Hotel Lotus offers 2-star accommodations with a fitness center and sun terrace.
Staff at the hotel are always available to provide information at the reception.
Union Station Kansas City is 7.3 miles from Hotel Lotus, while Sprint Center is 7.5 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 27 miles from the accommodation.

userReviews.title: It was great to get away from home and relax!
userReviews.positive: We chose this hotel for its proximity to the Royals stadium as we were in town to watch the Astros play the Royals.  It was very convenient to get to our other destinations as well (Crown Center, Legoland Discovery area, Aquarium).  The room was clean and we had a view of the pool, which my son enjoyed.  I was happy that the room had a bath tub as we were traveling with my son, so that made it easier for us.  We enjoyed the breakfast each morning.  My son loved swimming in the pool.
userReviews.negative: The pool water had a green tinge to it, indicating that the chemicals may not have been correct.  When we went down to swim, I found glass on the pool deck and notified the front desk.  There was also a bit of an "oily film" on the surface, which could have indicated that the pool needed to be backwash.  For the size of the pool, a floating chlorine tablet dispenser is usually not enough to maintain the pool water.  Our room overlooked the pool and we did see someone cleaning it one morning during our stay - they vacuumed it and rearranged the furniture.

name: Best Western Premier Kansas City Sports Complex Hotel
description:
Located across the street from Kauffman and Arrowhead Stadiums,  Best Western Premier Kansas City Sports Complex Hotel features an on-site restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
A 40-inch flat-screen cable TV is provided in every room at  Best Western Premier Kansas City Sports Complex Hotel. There is also a coffee machine.  Private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and linen.
A fitness center is offered at  Best Western Premier Kansas City Sports Complex Hotel. Other facilities offered include meeting facilities, luggage storage and dry cleaning. The property offers free parking.
Boulevard Bar & Grill serves American cuisine for dinner and weekend breakfast.  Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar during their stay.
The hotel is 6.3 mi from Country Club Plaza and 4.4 mi from Swope Park. Kansas City Airport is 22 mi away.

name: Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City I-435N Near Sports Complex
description:
Located 6 miles from downtown Kansas City, Missouri, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Midwest Worlds of Fun Amusement Park. It offers an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi.
Each traditional guest room at Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City I-435N Near Sports Complex is equipped with cable TV and a speaker phone with free local calling. They are furnished with a work desk.
Guests can work out at the on-site gym, featuring cardio machines and a mounted TV. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available.
A hot breakfast is served every morning at the Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City I-435N Near Sports Complex.
The Kansas City Zoo is a 20-minute drive from Quality Inn & Suites Kansas City I-435N Near Sports Complex. Kauffman Stadium and Arrowhead Stadium are 7.2 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.title: Not A Good Selection. Wait Till Remodel Is Done.
userReviews.positive:
I'm not sure I have anything positive to say about this place beyond the friendly staff of some.
I think if this place finished remodeling or fixing whatever they were doing and a stay was made, it could have reviews like other La Quintas.
userReviews.negative:
It's incredibly hard to list all the didn't likes. I'll try to list the main issues.
1) the entire place looked like a remodeling warzone. Probably why the breakfast was not available. They did have lemonade in the lobby though.
2) see picture, sadly it's the only one we took. But it looked like rooms were in process of being remodeled and stopped to rent out.
3) bedding, pillows, sheets, etc has incredibly disgusting stains. Had to request replacements for almost all of them.
4) bathrooms were incredibly small and cramped. 
5) circular air fresheners were all over the place to hid odors, some we figured were from smokers in non smoking rooms and other odors we didn't want to know.
6) requests for additional towels had to wait till next day when laundry service started up again.
Those are the main issues, problem is, La Quinta's are not known for being the same thing as Motel 6 but in this instance it was. I am guessing it's because of the remodeling going on. Perhaps they didn't want to shut down parts of the hotel while they remodeled?
This hotel has 2 wings to it, so they could have easily shutdown one wing and remodeled while the other was rented out. It seemed that every floor had something going on and wrong with it.
I think this place needs to finish doing whatever it was doing and then another review can be made and it could have more positive outlook. Right now, sadly, bad review for a hotel chain that has been pretty good.
userReviews.room: Double Room with Two Double Beds

userReviews.title: Disappointing
userReviews.positive: The location is good.  The bed was adequate.
userReviews.negative: The elevator had a do not use sign on it.  Pretty sure I requested the 1st floor, but got 2nd floor. My husband has many health issues. Two of the 3 ice machine were broken.  All the carpets desperately need to be cleaned or replaced.  Our room smelled like someone covering up cigarettes smoke.  Advertised breakfast, but only had coffee.  The coffee was so bad, made me think maybe it's a good thing that they didn't have breakfast.  They called less then 3 hrs. Before check in to say they are requiring $100. Cash at check in as a deposit, in case we smoked or ruined anything.  We refused at check in to do this.  (We are not smokers!)  Cleaning gets a questionable adequate. The table in the room looked like it hadn't been cleaned.

name: Econo Lodge Kansas City Downtown North
description:
At the Econo Lodge Downtown North hotel, both business and leisure travelers can enjoy a variety of features and friendly service at a great location. This hotel is less than four miles from Sprint Center arena and The Kansas City Power & Light District entertainment district.
Additional attractions close to this Missouri hotel include: Harrah's Casino, Isle of Capri Casino, Argosy Casino, Worlds of Fun theme park, Oceans of Fun amusement park.
There are several entertainment venues, cultural attractions and movie theaters in the surrounding area. Many shopping centers, specialty stores and retailers can be found close by. A number of restaurants are near the hotel.
Guests of this hotel can enjoy amenities like: Free continental breakfast, Free wireless high-speed Internet access, Picnic area with barbecue grill  and Guest laundry facilities. This is a dog-friendly hotel with a dog play area.
Business travelers staying at this hotel will appreciate additional conveniences like access to copy and fax service.
All guest rooms offer features like flat-screen televisions, curved shower rods, hair dryers, irons, ironing boards and cable television. Ask about our rooms that also have microwaves, refrigerators, mini bars and safes. Connecting rooms can be requested.
Ample parking is provided.

name: Harrah's North Kansas City Hotel & Casino
description:
Boasting 5 on-site dining options and a casino, this Kansas City hotel features cable TV with pay-per-view channels in every room.  The historic 18th & Vine District is 8 miles away.
Tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in every room at Harrah’s North Kansas City.  Located in the hotel’s towers, a hairdryer is included in all private bathrooms.
The 37 Steakhouse serves seafood and steak options for dinner in an upscale atmosphere.  The Corner Grill offers light snacks and The Roasted Coffeehouse provides breakfast fare.
Two floors of slots, table games, and more are available at Kansas City Harrah’s North casino.  VooDoo Lounge provides additional on-site entertainment including live music, salsa nights and comedians.
The American Royal Museum is 8 miles away.  The Harry S. Truman Library & Museum can be reached in 19 minutes’ drive.

userReviews.title: If you’re looking for a clean and decently priced place to stay north of the river, Harrah’s is where it’s at.
userReviews.positive:
At first glance, the property is well-kept, clean, and aesthetically pleasing. 
Our room was clean and there were no major deformations in the decor or functionality of the room.
Bedding and bathroom linens were all clean and soft.
userReviews.negative:
The more common areas such as lobbies and hallways leading to the casinos are maintained much better than the hotel halls and hotel rooms. we stayed in the Kansas City tower because the price is hard to bed. Drywall is cracking, wallpaper is peeling, carpets are bunched up, and there are cracks all along the ceiling and wall joints. 
Unfortunately, we could smell a lot of cigarette smoke from other rooms when their A/C would turn on and circulate air.
The bathroom was nice and specious for a cheaper room but the sink barely drained. Room 339.
The bed is way too soft. It was like laying in a ball pit and sinking to the bottom.

name: Aloft North Kansas City
description:
Located 4.4 miles from Sprint Center, Aloft North Kansas City offers 3-star accommodations in Kansas City and features a shared lounge, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
At the hotel, each room comes with a closet. All rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Aloft North Kansas City have a safety deposit box. At the accommodation, every room includes a seating area.
Aloft North Kansas City offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool. You can play pool at this 3-star hotel.
Kansas City Convention Center is 4.6 miles from the hotel, while Worlds of Fun is 5.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 15 miles from Aloft North Kansas City.

name: Hilton Kansas City Country Club Plaza
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hilton Kansas City Country Club Plaza! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located on Country Club Plaza and 10 minutes’ drive from the center of Kansas City, Missouri, this hotel features both indoor and outdoor pools. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas.
A 32-inch flat-screen TV, a microwave and a small refrigerator are found in each decorative room at Hilton Kansas City Country Club Plaza. Coffee-making facilities and a work desk are also included.
The Gallery Restaurant serves a hot breakfast buffet each morning as well as lunch and dinner through the day. Guests can also enjoy drinks from the lounge or the Starbucks kiosk.
A fitness center is open to all guests of the Hilton Kansas City Country Club Plaza. Concierge services and free weekday newspapers are also available.
The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art and Kansas City Sculpture Park are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel. The National World War I Museum is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: American Inn North Kansas City
description:
Located off Interstates 35 and 29, this Kansas City motel features a seasonal outdoor pool.  Each guest room includes cable TV and free Wi-Fi.  The Kansas City International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.
A microwave and refrigerator are offered in every room at American Inn North Kansas City.  For convenience, a work desk and telephone are also provided.
24-hour reception services are available throughout the property at North Kansas City American Inn.  Guest launderette facilities are located on site and a games room is available for family fun.
Spirits Restaurant is located within the property and serves cooked-to-order cuisine. Spirits Pub offers cocktails.
Shopping, dining, and entertainment options are just 4 miles away in the Power and Light District.  The Kansas City Convention Center is 8 minutes’ drive away.

name: InterContinental Kansas City at the Plaza, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located next to Country Club Plaza, this Missouri hotel features a restaurant, outdoor pool and 24-hour gym. It offers in-room safety deposit boxes and cable TV with pay-per-view movies.
The spacious and warm colored rooms at InterContinental Kansas City at the Plaza provide a desk and coffee maker along with a bathrobe. Many rooms feature views of Country Club Plaza.
Guests can enjoy fine dining at American Slang , open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
InterContinental Kansas City at the Plaza is within 1 miles of Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, the University of Missouri at Kansas City and Mission Hills Country Club.

userReviews.title: Really nice hotel, very good staff, amenities were good, but restaurant service lacking due to COVID
userReviews.positive: The room was very nice, the staff very good (the front desk at check-in was a bit stiff, and did not give me 3 keys when I requested them) otherwise the bellmen, and cleaning staff were very hospitable.  The young man Jon at the front desk was very helpful.  The bartender was very good.  The fitness center was very nice, nicer than some gyms I have been to, especially the locker room.  Pool area is very nice but too cold to use.  Nice access to the Plaza area and walkable.
userReviews.negative: Unfortunately, due to Covid-19 I presume, the bar was not open late.  There was no breakfast service, No real restaurant to speak of, but the hotel across the street was serving.  We were there for a wedding reception.  We had four children who needed children's meals.  They served all adults first, and we were all pretty much done with our food and we had reminded the wait staff we needed children's meals and were told they were coming.  Finally, I had to track down a manager and insist we get some children's meals.  They did finally respond and serve the meals.  Children get antsy and should be fed first so the parents can enjoy their meal.  Finally, I hate that I reserved my room months ago, and before the wedding, I was able to get a rate at least $50 a night cheaper.  Even cheaper than the block rate.  In addition, early on they said the block was full, well expand it! There was plenty of room in the hotel, not full.  Offer the best rate to wedding guest or locked groups.

name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Plaza
description:
Located in Kansas City, 2.8 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial, SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Plaza has accommodations with a fitness center, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Guests can use a bar.
At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Plaza provides certain accommodations with city views, and rooms include a patio. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.
Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options.
SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Plaza offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool.
Union Station Kansas City is 3.3 miles from the hotel, while Kansas City Convention Center is 3.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 23 miles from SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Plaza.

userReviews.title: Enjoyed my stay overall
userReviews.positive: I like that breakfast lasted until 10am so I didn’t have to wake up too early. I appreciate the welcome message on the tv. Loved the outdoor patio
userReviews.negative: Paid for parking but spaces were extremely limited. Entrance to garage is very tight if the top lot is full. I had to enter through the exit of the garage for easier access. There is not enough parking for hotel guest. This made it difficult for visitor parking because it’s shared with paid guest which isnt fair. Housekeeping was my only cleanliness issue. The linen was apparently not changed because there was vicks vapor rub trash under the top sheet. Gross. Regardless of appearance, linen should be changed between every guest. I am a former health inspector for the city and can confirm this to be against the code. The shower is small so it was difficult to thoroughly wash. Especially when The shower head was not able to be lowered. It sprayed really hard pressure water at my neck which was not soothing. Maybe it was broken

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Country Club Plaza
description:
This Kansas City Hampton Inn offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV, just steps away from the shops and restaurants of the historic Country Club Plaza. Facilities include an indoor pool.
The air-conditioned rooms of Hampton Inn & Suites Country Club Plaza are decorated with warm colors, carpeted floors and wooden furniture. All rooms have a seating area, a work desk, and tea and coffee making facilities.
Every morning, a hot buffet breakfast is served in the breakfast room. Light meals, beverages and snacks are available at the on-site convenience store.
Guests can work out at Hampton Inn Country Club Plaza’s fitness room. The hotel also offers a 24-hour reception, an on-site cash machine, and a clothing store.
The American Royal Museum is just 4 miles from Hampton Inn & Suites Country Club Plaza, and the Kansas City Zoo is 5 miles away.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites North Kansas City, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express offers modern accommodation adjacent to the freeway that links North Kansas City to the city centre. It features a fully-operational business centre, a pool and a well-equipped gym.
Spacious rooms at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites NORTH KANSAS CITY are decorated in bright colours and have large windows. They all include flat-screen TVs with cable channels, hairdryer and ironing facilities.
Guests can enjoy a hot buffet breakfast, served daily at the restaurant of the hotel. Nearby Armour Road offers many local eateries and diners.
Popular attractions close to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites include the Arabia Steamboat Museum, 8 miles away, and the Nelson Atkins Museum, less than a 10-minute drive away. Free parking is available on site.

name: The Raphael Hotel, Autograph Collection
description:
This hotel is 7 miles from Kansas City and 6 miles from the University of Missouri. The historic hotel features a gym, business center and rooms with a flat-screen TVs.
The Raphael Hotel Kansas City rooms have a refrigerator and coffee maker. The rooms have access to free Wi-Fi.
The Kansas City Raphael Hotel features the Chaz Restaurant and Lounge. The hotel offers 24 hour room service.
The Raphael Hotel is 6 miles from the Kansas Zoo. The hotel is within a 2 minute walk to the Country Club Plaza, which features shopping.

name: Courtyard Kansas City Country Club Plaza
description:
Less than 1 miles from the Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, this Kansas City hotel offers spacious rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. A seasonal outdoor pool is featured on-site.
The colorful rooms at Courtyard Kansas City Country Club Plaza come equipped with microwaves and refrigerators. All air-conditioned rooms include a work desk and ironing facilities.
Courtyard Kansas City Country Club offers an on-site fitness center that includes cardio equipment, treadmills and free weights. A business center is available on-site.
The Parkview Restaurant, located on the property, offers a hot breakfast buffet in a casual setting.
The Sprint Center is a 10 minutes’ drive from this hotel. The National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 3 miles away.

name: Kansas City Marriott Country Club Plaza
description:
This Marriott overlooks Country Club Plaza, Kansas City’s entertainment and shopping district. It offers a full-service restaurant and rooms that feature modern decor with 49-inch Smart HDTVs with streaming capability.
Kansas City Marriott Country Club Plaza rooms feature white linens and down comforters. Each features a coffee maker, refrigerator, and WiFi access. Room service is available.
The Main Street Grill at Kansas City Marriott is open all day and serves American cuisine including steaks. Café Express, located in the lobby, offers Starbucks coffee and snacks.
Guests have free access to the Marriott Kansas City Country Club Plaza’s well-equipped fitness center. A business center is also available for guest use.
Country Club Plaza Marriott Kansas City is less than 1 miles from Highway 56, and 6 miles from the Kansas City Zoo. Guests can reach Kansas City International Airport with a 23 miles drive.

The buffet breakfast at $20 per person was good but many of our family members wanted breakfast but not a whole buffet. name: Sonesta Select Kansas City Airport Tiffany Springs
description:
Sonesta Select Kansas City Airport is located off I-29, just 3 miles from Kansas City Airport. It features an indoor swimming pool and fitness suite. Free airport transfers are available.
All of the spacious rooms at the Sonesta Select Kansas City Airport feature free wireless internet, cable TV and hot drink facilities. In addition each room has a balcony or terrace.
Guests can relax in the indoor swimming pool or make use of the fitness facilities. The Sonesta Select Kansas City Airport Hotel is 1.3 miles from Tiffany Greens Golf Club and 30 minutes’ drive from the Arrowhead and Kauffman Stadia.
A complimentary shuttle service is provided to and from the airport, and the hotel has paid on-site car parking.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton KCI Airport
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Home2 Suites by Hilton KCI Airport is located in Kansas City, 15 miles from Kansas City Convention Center and 15 miles from Sprint Center. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property.
All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, while some rooms at the hotel also have a seating area. At Home2 Suites by Hilton KCI Airport the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.
Home2 Suites by Hilton KCI Airport offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool.
A business center and a gym are available at the property as well as free private parking.
Union Station Kansas City is 16 miles from the hotel, while Worlds of Fun is 16 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 3.7 miles from Home2 Suites by Hilton KCI Airport.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Kansas City Airport
description:
Located next to Kansas City International Airport, this Missouri hotel offers free 24-hour airport shuttles, free shuttles within 5 miles and a restaurant. Its spacious, contemporary rooms feature free Wi-Fi.
Each room at Four Points by Sheraton Kansas City Airport includes tea and coffee-making facilities. Other room amenities also include a safe and a work desk.
During their stay, guests can swim in the outdoor pool or workout in the well-equipped gym.
The Boulevard Grill, located on site, serves American cuisine in a casual atmosphere for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
The Four Points by Sheraton Kansas City Airport is a half mile from the TWA Museum and 3 miles from Tiffany Greens Golf Club. Worlds of Fun amusement park is 18 miles away.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport
description:
Located 10 minutes from Springs Aquatic Center and 25 minutes from downtown Kansas City, Missouri, this hotel features flat-screen TVs and a shuttle to/from Kansas City International Airport.
The rooms at this Kansas City Fairfield Inn and Suites include a refrigerator, microwave and free Wi-Fi. A work desk and coffee maker are also provided.
Kansas City Airport Fairfield Inn and Suites hosts an on-site fitness center and indoor pool. A continental breakfast is served daily. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available.
Worlds of Fun Amusement Park is 20 minutes from Fairfield Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport. The Harry S. Truman Library & Museum is 30 minutes from the hotel.

userReviews.title: A nice place to stay that is close to the airport
userReviews.positive: It was a very nice hotel to stay at. The room was nice and laid out. The bed was nice and comfortable, and plenty of pillows. There was air conditioning, which also doubles as a heater during colder days. The bath was nice, with a shower option; water was nice and warm. Plenty of storage space for clothing and accessories; with draws and hangers used for storage. The pool is nice and big; with a lift if needed. Breakfast wise there is a good selection available, with a few hot items, and plenty of cereal, fruit and yogurts. They have tea and coffee options, with apple and orange juice, as additional options. There is a small shop found in the lobby, selling a few snacks, and simple dinners.

name: Kansas City Airport Marriott
description:
Overlooking Berlin Reservoir lake, Kansas City Airport Marriott is the only hotel located on the grounds of Kansas City International Airport. It’s only one mile away from the Expo Center.
An indoor pool and a fully equipped fitness center are on site at this Kansas City Marriott hotel. A Grand Grand Ballroom is available as well.
A cable TV with in-room films is provided in every room at the Kansas City Airport Marriott. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. In-room WiFi and room service are available for a fee.
There is a business center on the property. Marriott Kansas City Airport also offers express check-in and check-out, newspapers, and laundry facilities. WiFi access is free in public areas.
Kansas City Airport Marriott is located 9.9 mi from the Zona Rosa business and commercial area. Kansas City center is 25 minutes' drive away.

name: Wyndham Garden Kansas City Airport
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Wyndham Garden Kansas City Airport! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool, Wyndham Garden Kansas City Airport is located off Interstate 29, just 5 miles from Kansas City International Airport. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all rooms.
A 42-inch flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at Wyndham Garden Kansas City Airport. Complete with a mini refrigerator, wet bar, and coffeemaker.
The Commons at Wyndham Garden Kansas City Airport features light appetizers, Starbucks® coffee, tea, beer, and wine.
A fitness center is available at this property 24/7.
Shopping and dining at Zona Rosa can be reached in a 5 minute drive. Downtown Kansas City is 14 miles away. The property offers Free Parking during stay dates.

For example the parking lot is filled with pot holes, elevator buttons work but seem to “stick” and the bathrooms are clean but appear to need a deep clean, bath towels are a lower grade (thinner). Overall we feel like the price has gone up but the quality has gone down.  Still a really nice hotel but I will shop around more on my next visit and will probably not choose this hotel.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City Plaza
description:
Within walking distance from Country Club Plaza premier shopping and historic Union Station, spacious guestrooms featuring separate sleeping and living areas along with modern facilities await guests at this all-suite hotel.
Popular points of interest, including the Kansas City Zoo and the Bartle Hall Convention Center can be found only steps from the Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City Plaza front doors. Guests can also explore the Plaza Shopping District and Westport Entertainment Center located nearby.
With a free daily cooked-to-order breakfast, a fully equipped fitness center and in-room microwaves and refrigerators every stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City Plaza is sure to be enjoyable. The hotel also features a free evening manager's reception along with high-speed internet access.

userReviews.title: St Luke's procedure stay
userReviews.positive: The location was great. My husband was having a medical procedure at the hospital across the street. We ended up needing to stay an additional night because my husband had complications. Once the front desk staff knew we were there for a medical procedure, they offered us a cheaper hospital rate for the additional night. The hotel was clean, comfortable, and aesthetically pleasing.
userReviews.negative: The breakfast was late in terms of availability and preparation. The staff person preparing the food was complaining about being short staffed and seemed frustrated. He was not apologetic. I reported the situation to the front desk, and they didn't seem to take the situation seriously. I was hoping they would send someone to help him. It made breakfast uncomfortable. Many guests were standing around waiting for coffee and food. Some of us were on tight schedules. I felt uncomfortable asking for things I needed because the staff person seemed upset.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Kansas City - Airport - Tiffany Springs
description:
This Extended Stay America - Kansas City - Airport - Tiffany Springs is located in Kansas City and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Kansas City is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry, ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows.
A grab and go breakfast is available. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. The property offers free onsite parking and free local phone calls. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Zona Rosa, the Legol and and the Tiffany Springs Water Park.

userReviews.positive: the location was on our route
userReviews.negative: everything! The room was not great, and it was not what was requested. When traveling with a person that has mobility issues, DO NOT PUT THEM AT THE END OF THE HALL! We requested first floor near lobby, or near elevator, and instead we got top floor at the very end of the hall. In addition, the tables and TV remote were covered in what I could only decribe as food grease, and we had a reservation for 3 only there was no bedding provided for the hide-a-bed. We had to try and track that down, and it required 3 separate trips to the front desk because staff was ABSENT each time we tried. Add to that that the pillows were horrible! It was like 3/4 of a pillow as an entire corner was missing! This was the case with 3 of our pillows (photo attached). Finally, the dead bolt on the door DID NOT WORK and we kept having someone coming to the door and trying to open it. Last., there was no grab-n-go breakfast as advertised. DO NOT RECOMMEND! We won't stay here again.

name: Quality Suites Kansas City International Airport
description:
The Quality Suites Airport hotel is just two miles from the Kansas City International Airport. For added convenience, hotel provides free airport transportation for its guests. Downtown Kansas City with its numerous attractions and exciting things to see and do is minutes away.
Additional points of interest close to this Missouri hotel include Worlds of Fun amusement park, Oceans of Fun water park, the Crown Center shopping and entertainment area, Kauffman Stadium baseball field and the Kansas City Zoo.
Several businesses are located near the hotel, including Harley-Davidson Vehicle and Powertrain Operations, Worldspan (Kansas City office) and NOAA's National Weather Service Weather Forecast Office. Kansas City offers hundreds of annual events and festivals that are sure to be fun for the entire family.
Visitors will enjoy browsing a wide variety of nearby specialty shops. Several riverboat casinos are near the hotel. A variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges can be found in the surrounding area.
Full-service features and amenities at this Missouri hotel include: Free breakfast including hot waffles and rotating days of eggs, meat or biscuits and sausage gravy, Free wireless high-speed Internet access, Free local calls and Free weekday newspaper.
Guests of this hotel will enjoy relaxing in the indoor pool and hot tub. Be sure to take advantage of the on-site exercise room.
Corporate travelers will appreciate conveniences like an on-site business center and access to copy and fax services. The hotel's meeting facilities are available to accommodate most events and business functions.
All guest rooms at this hotel are suites that come equipped with microwaves, refrigerators, coffee makers with free coffee, hair dryers, sofa sleepers, irons, ironing boards and 32-inch flat-screen LCD televisions. Select suites offer upgraded features like kitchenettes.
Valet cleaning services are provided for added guest convenience.
For added convenience, hotel provides free airport transportation for its guests.  This sentence needs to be removed as we now charge for shuttle services.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Kansas City - Country Club Plaza
description:
This Extended Stay America - Kansas City - Country Club Plaza is located in Kansas City and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Kansas City is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry, ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee.
A grab and go breakfast is available. The property offers free onsite parking and free local phone calls. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Country Club Plaza, the Power Light District and the Sprint Center.

name: SpringHill Suites Kansas City Airport
description:
Located 13 miles from Kansas City Convention Center, SpringHill Suites Kansas City Airport offers 3-star accommodations in Kansas City and features free bikes, a fitness center and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At SpringHill Suites Kansas City Airport all rooms come with bed linen and towels.
A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available every morning at the property.
The accommodation offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool and sun terrace.
Sprint Center is 13 miles from SpringHill Suites Kansas City Airport, while Union Station Kansas City is 14 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 5.6 miles from the hotel.

name: Unity Hotel and Conference Ctr, Ascend Hotel Collection
description:
Unity Hotel and Conference Ctr, Ascend Hotel Collection offers accommodations in Kansas City. A complimentary hot continental breakfast is provided.
All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a Keuring coffee machine in the room. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.
There is a fitness center and 24-hour front desk at the property.
Lee's Summit is located 3.7 mi from the property. National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 13 mi from Unity Village Hotel & Conf Ctr, Ascend Hotel Collection while Sprint Center is 14 mi away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 29 mi from the property.

userReviews.title: Looked like a crime scene.
userReviews.positive: It was close to my event.
userReviews.negative:
The hotel room looked like the scene of a crime. It had been cleaned, but only just barely. There was broken glass on the office chair and a square of carpet cut out of the floor which was replaced by a different colored carpet segment. The bathroom had splatter stains (maybe wood stain from refinishing the door?) and random curly hairs on the walls up to the ceiling. 
My favorite feature was the two way mirror which extended the length of the room behind the headboards of our queen beds and a strategically placed smaller mirror on the opposite wall. We spent an indeterminate amount of time trying to see what was behind that mirror. 
We scoured the room to make sure there were no secret entrances for a human trafficking scenario and found discarded sex toy packaging left in the room by the previous guests.  The sheets displayed a smattering of body fluid stains.
After we covered all the mirrors with sheets and blankets and pushed a dresser up to the door (which wouldn't deadbolt without extreme effort) we were able to get a few hours of sleep. 
Overall, maybe it was worth the $80, but I wouldn't stay here again even if they fixed the broken lock on the external ground level door allowing anyone and everyone to enter the hotel.
If you want to save a little bit of money and still have decent wifi and TV, this is your place. If you are looking for a safe haven during a layover or a nearby convention, this is not the room for you. 
Sorry to the management for the poor review. You guys seemed nice, and I'm not usually one to scathe, but this was bad enough that I need to warn other travelers.
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds - Non-Smoking

The air conditioner in the room worked well. Relatively low price (though now I know why). Friendly and helpful manager on duty.

The bathtub drain was slow, which caused water to back up in the tub while I was taking a shower--which made my feet itch a lot. Gross! I couldn't wait to get out of this place.

Microtel never once, in the initial reply or the 2nd one, stated we could not have two animals. So we drive 5 hours to find this out, and then we spent another hour trying to find another hotel.
