name: Orangewood Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport
description:
This nonsmoking hotel is 2.4 miles away from Kansas City International Airport and 17 miles away from downtown Kansas City, Missouri. The hotel offers 24hrs free shuttle service to and from Kansas City International Airport and within 5 miles of the shopping district from 9am-8pm. It features a walk-out courtyard and free Wi-Fi in all rooms.
Each simply furnished guest room at Orangewood Hotel is equipped with a cable TV.
A coffee maker and work desk are provided.
Orangewood Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport features a newly renovated heated indoor swimming pool and hot tub/jacuzzi.
A complimentary hot buffet breakfast is served every morning at this non pet-friendly Kansas City hotel. A 24hrs business center is located off of the lobby and laundry services are available.
Worlds of Fun Amusement Park is a 20-minute drive from the Kansas City Plaza Hotel. Tiffany Greens Golf Club is less than 4 miles away.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast.
Sprint Center is 13 miles from Super 8 by Wyndham Kansas City at Barry Road/Airport, while Union Station Kansas City is 14 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 5 miles from the accommodation.

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Kansas City Airport
description:
Located in Kansas City, 18 miles from Kansas City Convention Center and 18 miles from Sprint Center, TownePlace Suites by Marriott Kansas City Airport provides accommodations with free WiFi, air conditioning, free bikes and a shared lounge.
Featuring a kitchenette with a fridge and a dishwasher, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa bed.
Guests at the condo hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
TownePlace Suites by Marriott Kansas City Airport offers 3-star accommodations with an indoor pool and grill. A business center and a gym are available at the property as well as free private parking.
Union Station Kansas City is 19 miles from the accommodation, while National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 20 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International, 1.2 miles from TownePlace Suites by Marriott Kansas City Airport, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Kansas City Airport
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Quinta by Wyndham Kansas City Airport! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
This hotel has a free airport shuttle service to and from the Kansas City International Airport, which is 7 miles away.  Each guest room comes equipped with a flat-screen cable TV.
Free Wi-Fi is available in every room at La Quinta Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport.  Guests can enjoy the included microwave and refrigerator, as well.
An indoor pool and hot tub are on site at Kansas City Airport La Quinta Inn and Suites.  Fresh fruit, waffles, and more are served as part of the daily continental breakfast, and a fitness center is available to all guests.
Downtown Kansas City is 12 miles from this hotel.  The Worlds of Fun amusement park can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

name: Holiday Inn Kansas City Airport, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located off Interstate 29, this Ferrelview, Missouri hotel features an indoor swimming pool and a restaurant. Free WiFi access is available, and Kansas City Airport is 1.9 mi away.
Cable TV and a coffee machine are included in every room at Holiday Inn Kansas City Airport. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and ironing facilities.
Kems Café and Lounge is on site and serves American cuisine for breakfast and dinner.  Guests can enjoy a cocktail or beer in the lounge.
A fitness center is available at Kansas City Airport Holiday Inn. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a tour desk and shops (on site). The property offers free parking.
The KCI Expo Center is next door to this hotel.  Entertainment and sightseeing in the heart of Kansas City is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: KCI Lodge
description:
The Econo Lodge Airport is located near Kansas City International Airport. Save on parking fees and room rates with the Park, Stay and Fly package that is available at the hotel, offering reasonable and affordable accommodations. KCI Expo Center, Zona Rosa and the Harley Davidson plant are located just minutes away from the hotel. Downtown Kansas City including the Power & Light District and Sprint Center arena are just 15 minutes away.
Arrowhead and Kauffman Stadiums, Crown Center, Worlds of Fun/Oceans of Fun, Kansas Speedway, Bartle Hall Convention Center, Westport and US Army Combined Arms Center and Fort Leavenworth are additional area destinations for both business and leisure travelers.
Guests of the hotel will appreciate many full-service amenities, including, free continental breakfast, free airport transportation from 4:30 a.m. to midnight, free wireless high-speed Internet access in select rooms and lobby and free local calls.
Business travelers staying at the Econo Lodge Airport will appreciate access to the hotel's fax machine.
All rooms include cable television, while some rooms include microwaves. Nonsmoking rooms can be requested.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Kansas City - Airport
description:
This Extended Stay America - Kansas City - Airport - Plaza Circle is located in Kansas City and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Kansas City is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry, ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows.
Enjoy grab-and-go breakfast, which includes coffee, breakfast bars, hot cereal, and pastries. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee.
The property offers free onsite parking and free local phone calls. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the KCI Expo Center and the Zona Rosa.

userReviews.title: False advertising for essential services that are not provided - Covid is no excuse for lying!
userReviews.positive: The room is comfortable and functional with a full kitchen (though not a single supply - probably because I am short-term). The bed is very comfortable.  Overall I would be satisfied if the other amenities were as advertised.
userReviews.negative: I am extremely unhappy because of the false advertising for this hotel.  I selected it because I had to stay a night at the Kansas City airport following a late evening arrival and continuing travel the next afternoon - and the announcement for the hotel says that there is an Airport Shuttle service, as well as breakfast served.  I wrote in my reservation a request to confirm the availability of the shuttle at my arrival time, but did not receive a reply.  On arrival, I called and was informed that they no longer offer that service due to Covid, so I had to pay $15 for a taxi to bring me here - and had to do so again to get back to the airport.  I was then informed at check-in that they no longer offer breakfast due to Covid - and there are no food/restaurant facilities anywhere in the vicinity.  Both of these services are clearly noted in the listing . . . and since the Covid situation has been around for nearly a year now, there has been more than enough time to change the listing to be more honest!  I definitely would have chosen a different hotel had I known the truth - so I feel cheated and abused.

userReviews.title: Good clean room for a good price near the airport
userReviews.positive: The room was quite big and very practically furnished. The bathroom had everything it needs, the bed was comfortable and everything was clean. The AC/Heating worked perfectly fine. All in all a good room for the price. The lady during check out was super nice and chatting with me while I was waiting for my taxi.
userReviews.negative: When I arrived I was greeted rather annoyed. Didn't expect cheers but a little more enthusiasm would have been nice. But the lady in the morning made up for it.
userReviews.room: Queen studio with 1 Queen Bed - Disability Access/Non-Smoking

userReviews.negative: You have to sign multiple things. I signed less when I bought my house. Price for room, $100 deposit, $250 in case you smoke. Would’ve been nice if staff takes care of the snow in the parking lot. Also, I heard the neighbors TV and conversations ALL NIGHT long. Very annoying.

description:

The Hilton Kansas City Airport is conveniently located close to several major freeways, which offer easy access to many surrounding attractions. Argosy Casino, Ford, General Motors and Zona Rosa shopping/entertainment are all nearby.
Spacious guestrooms at the Kansas City Airport Hilton are furnished with wireless internet access, flat-screen TVs and refrigerators.Guests will also enjoy the on-site Hilton Fitness by Precor facility as well as the hotel's restaurant & bar, Asado Urban Grill.

userReviews.title: A solid B+
userReviews.positive:
I enjoyed my room. The bed was very comfortable, and the amount of pillows was an added bonus. I'm not a huge Starbucks fan, but having this coffee shop on site was a life-saver for my very early mornings.
I stayed at this hotel for an event, and the execution of the banquet staff as well as management was excellent. Good job Hilton!
userReviews.negative:
It appeared majority of the Covid preventative measures were not up to par. The hand sanitizer stations were out of product, and the women's bathrooms had the rolls of paper towels placed on counter for all to touch instead of inside a dispenser. 
Also, in general, the hotel was very hot in most areas. It took quite a long time for my room to obtain a comfortable temperature. The hallways and common areas were pretty hot/humid as well.

name: Best Western Plus Kansas City Airport - KCI East
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Best Western Plus Kansas City Airport - KCI East is located in Kansas City, 16 miles from Kansas City Convention Center and 17 miles from Sprint Center. With a fitness center, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property provides free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.
At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room comes with a coffee machine, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. Guest rooms in Best Western Plus Kansas City Airport - KCI East are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.
The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Best Western Plus Kansas City Airport - KCI East.
Union Station Kansas City is 18 miles from the hotel, while National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 19 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 0.6 miles from Best Western Plus Kansas City Airport - KCI East.

userReviews.positive: The location, bed was comfy, shower was nice.
userReviews.negative: I requested to be picked up at the car rental facility at KC airport. I waited 25 min after calling and then called again. I was told that the hotel shuttle could not pick me up there and I had to taking the parking bus back to the airport and walk to the shuttle drop off and pick up point in front of the airport. I have a bad knee and walked more than I should have. in addition I could have fallen and hurt myself. I was finally taken by shuffle back to the hotel and when I arrived had a discussion with the desk clerk who then told me that it was a misunderstanding and apologized. in my opinion he should have communicated better and there was no excuse for this inconvenience.

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Kansas City International Airport
description:
This Days Inn is only a 5-minute drive from Kansas City International Airport and offers a shuttle service at charge ($ 5.00 airport shuttle toll fee) per trip). It features an indoor pool and free WiFi in all rooms and public areas. hotel is 100% non-smoking.
Guest rooms at Days Inn by Wyndham Kansas City International Airport are furnished with a work desk and a lounge chair. Each includes cable TV, a coffee maker and a hairdryer.
The KCI Expo Convention Center is 0.9 mi from Days Inn by Wyndham Kansas City International Airport. Zonarosa shopping and entertainment district is a 10-minute drive from the hotel, and Downtown Kansas City is within a 20-minute drive.

name: Sonesta Select Kansas City South Overland Park
description:
Sonesta Select Kansas City South Overland Park is located 4 miles from the Overland Park Convention Center and 8 miles from Overland Park city center. This hotel features an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi.
All guest rooms at the Sonesta Select Kansas City South Overland Park include a sofa bed and a flat-screen cable TV. Some rooms have a small refrigerator.
Guests will enjoy the on-site leisure facilities like the fitness center.
The Commons at Sonesta Select at Sonesta serves traditional American fare for dinner. Starbucks® beverages are available and a 24-hour market offers food and drink options. A grab-n-go breakfast is available.
Guests are only 15 minutes’ drive from the Kansas City Zoo or a professional football game at Arrowhead Stadium. The Kansas Speedway is only 25 miles from the hotel.

name: Drury Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport
description:
Just off Interstate 29 and less than 5 miles from Kansas City International Airport, this Missouri hotel features guest rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.  A complimentary hot breakfast is served each morning.
A refrigerator and a microwave are included in every room at Drury Inn & Suites Kansas City Airport. Free toiletries and ironing facilities are also provided in all guest rooms.
Guests can enjoy a swim in the indoor-outdoor pool or relax in the hot tub at Kansas City Airport Drury Inn. The on-site fitness center is available 24 hours a day, and free appetizers and beverages are provided nightly.
Central Kansas City is 20 minutes’ drive from this hotel. Springs Aquatic Center and Tiffany Hills Park are within 1 miles of the property.

name: Residence Inn Kansas City Airport
description:
Just 10 minutes’ drive from Kansas City International Airport, this apartment-style hotel offers a free airport shuttle and free Wi-Fi. Each suite is equipped with a full kitchen.
A separate seating area with a flat-screen cable TV is included in every suite at Residence Inn Kansas City Airport.  For added convenience, each room features ironing facilities and a hairdryer.
An on-site gift/sundry shopping service are also offered.  Guests can also make use of the fitness center, business center, and laundry service.
The KCI Expo Center and shopping and dining in the Zona Rosa district can be reached in 6 minutes’ drive.  The Kansas City city center is 20 miles away.

userReviews.title: It was dirty, but otherwise... just 'okay'
userReviews.positive: I needed a room for the night so my daughter could get on an early flight. The hotel lobby was nice and clean and the staff was helpful at check-in. The hotel is big, so he told me which door to park by and how to get to my room, which I appreciated. The breakfast was pretty good; nothing spectacular, but a decent variety for a hotel breakfast.
userReviews.negative: First thing when I walked into the room, was a weird food smell. I opened the sliding door (no balcony, but there's a balcony door with a rail on the outside of the window) and the windows in the bedroom (which could only open 2-3 inches because they put a guard on it), and it still smelled the next day. I also got a room with a pull-out bed, and there was no bedding to make up the bed, so someone brought some to the room for us. When I made the bed up, my daughter said she couldn't sleep on it because it was so lumpy. I ended up putting the pull-out back into a couch and she slept on it that way. The wallpaper in the bathroom was looking pretty bad by the showerhead and the corners in the bathroom were gross, there was also some kind of sand or dirt or something on the bathroom floor, so it was definitely NOT clean. Our TV remotes were also in little clear bags, which I thought was odd. The pool was okay, but the hot tub is permanantley closed, and that was a bummer.
userReviews.room: One Bedroom Suite 1 King, Sofa Bed

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Kansas City - South
description:
This Extended Stay America - Kansas City - South is located in Kansas City and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Kansas City is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry, ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows.
Guests can enjoy a grab and go breakfast at the property. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee.
The property offers free onsite parking and free local phone calls. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include Arrowhead Stadium, the Overland Park Convention Center and the International House of Prayer.

address.full: 550 East 105th Street, Kansas City, MO 64131, United States of America

userReviews.title: Disappointed in the main managers lack of care and help for customers.
userReviews.positive: The lady that checked us in was super friendly and helpful. The location was great for where I had to have infusions done. The other people living there (they rent them out monthly) were very nice and helpful as well.
userReviews.negative: The ladies at the front desk were wonderful. When we arrived to check in I had cash to pay the 100$ deposit that was required. I was told I couldn't use cash and informed them that the website said I must have cash for the deposit. So they charged my card for that as well. The gentleman that worked up front during the day (short,skinny, parked his black car right at the door) was very rude. He complained about people smoking at the front side of the building due to vents and smoke going in them. My daughter stayed there with me as I had to have infusions each day which I have to return for every 2 weeks. The elevator and whole 3rd floor smelled like urine and the marijuana was so strong it burnt our eyes. We couldn't open our window cause they didn't have screens. There was no coffee pot or bagged breakfast as stated. I had to leave to buy these items. The parking lot had beer boxes and trash everywhere. Me and my daughter picked it up and took it in the gentleman didn't offer to take it to the trash. I can barely walk due to SPS. We waited at the front desk 4 times for over 10 minutes and no one was around to help us? Had to pay extra for wifi just to be able to FaceTime and give my family updates on my medical treatments.
userReviews.room: Queen studio with 1 Queen Bed - Disability Access/Non-Smoking

I would stay here again but would have to inspect the room fully before settling in.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City International Airport
description:
Offering a convenient location minutes from Kansas City International Airport and Interstate 29, this all-suite hotel features spacious accommodations and exceptional amenities, only a short distance from area attractions.
While staying at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City International Airport, guests can take advantage of a free daily cooked-to-order breakfast along with a free daily evening reception. Guestrooms at the hotel feature private sleeping and living areas as well as microwaves and refrigerators.
The Embassy Suites by Hilton Kansas City International Airport is located close to the Zona Rosa Shopping and Entertainment District as well as the Kansas Motor Speedway and the Convention Center. The corporate offices of Citibank, Sony and many more are also nearby.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Kansas City Airport
description:
Experience all the comforts of home, including in-room full kitchens, at this all-suite hotel, located minutes from major corporations and Kansas City International Airport, and offering free airport shuttle service.
Start the day at the Homewood Suites Kansas City-Airport with a free hot breakfast. Finish some work in the modern business center, or relax in the center courtyard pool. In the evening, browse for gifts in the on-site souvenir shop then attend the free manager's reception, featuring a light meal and beverages.
In the area surrounding the Kansas City-Airport Homewood Suites discover the corporate offices of Kellogg, Toyota, Citigroup and more. The Kansas City Zoo, the Kansas Motor Speedway and the Verizon Amphitheater are also only a short distance away.

userReviews.title: Overall, awesome for a family getaway!
userReviews.positive: We had gone to Kansas City for the first time to visit Worlds of Fun for our daughter's 3rd birthday and were extremely satisfied with the hotel. We did not expect a full kitchen and it was a definite bonus. The breakfast in the morning is always nice but, it was great to pinch some pennies and cook our own lunches at the hotel. Having separate living and bedroom area was also an unexpected bonus-- while our daughter napped in the bedroom, it allowed for my husband and myself to relax and watch TV in the living area. It was very quiet, the room extremely clean and the area not too far from the city. 10 out of 10!

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Kansas City Airport, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering free shuttle service to Kansas City International Airport, this Missouri hotel features an indoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is included in all guest rooms. Continental breakfast is served daily.
A flat-screen cable TV, microwave, and small refrigerator are provided in all rooms at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Kansas City Airport. Every room also has a work desk with an ergonomic chair.
All Kansas City Airport Holiday Inn Express and Suites guests will have access to a business center and an on-site laundromat for added convenience. The front desk is available 24-hours a day.
This hotel is 11 miles from Worlds of Fun theme park and 2 miles from a variety of shopping and dining options at Zona Rosa. Kansas City city center is 14 miles away.

userReviews.negative: For rate paid, I was expecting to be able to use the complimentary airport shuttle service; however, when I inquired about riding the 8AM shuttle to the airport (several minutes before 8AM), I was informed it had already left and would be another 30 minutes before the next trip. Not knowing how long security wait times would be at the airport before my flight, I couldn't take the risk of waiting, so had to use Lyft. I'd recommend to the hotel management that they ask the shuttle driver(s) to leave promptly, but not EARLY.

name: Executive Inn & Suites
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodations, Executive Inn & Suites is located in Kansas City, 5.8 miles from Kauffman Stadium and 12 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Kansas City Convention Center is 13 miles away and Worlds of Fun is 15 miles from the hotel.
Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Executive Inn & Suites each room includes bed linen and towels.
Staff at the accommodation are available to give guidance at the 24-hour front desk.
Union Station Kansas City is 12 miles from Executive Inn & Suites, while Sprint Center is 12 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 32 miles from the hotel.

name: Fairfield by Marriott Inn & Suites Kansas City North, Gladstone
description:
Featuring free bikes, a fitness center as well as a bar, Fairfield by Marriott Inn & Suites Kansas City North, Gladstone is located in Kansas City, 10 miles from Kansas City Convention Center. The property is around 10 miles from Sprint Center, 11 miles from Worlds of Fun and 11 miles from Union Station Kansas City. The hotel has an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk.
The rooms is fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast.
Fairfield by Marriott Inn & Suites Kansas City North, Gladstone offers a business center for guest use.
National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 12 miles from the accommodation, while Kauffman Stadium is 16 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 12 miles from Fairfield by Marriott Inn & Suites Kansas City North, Gladstone.

userReviews.title: A romantic weekend in Kansas City.
userReviews.positive:
My wife and I had an excellent stay at Fairfield Inn & Suites Kansas City North/Gladstone. From the moment we checked in, we were impressed with the friendly and attentive staff who went out of their way to make us feel welcome.
Our room was spacious, clean, and well-appointed, with comfortable beds and modern amenities like a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The bathroom was spotless and stocked with plenty of fresh towels and toiletries.
We were also pleased with the hotel's facilities, which included a fitness center, indoor pool, and hot tub. The complimentary breakfast buffet was also a highlight, with a variety of delicious options to choose from.
One thing that really stood out to us was the hotel's convenient location. It was just a short drive from downtown Kansas City, which made it easy to explore the city's attractions and restaurants.
Overall, we highly recommend Fairfield Inn & Suites Kansas City North/Gladstone to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient place to stay in the Kansas City area. The staff was exceptional, the rooms were great, and the amenities were top-notch. We would definitely stay here again in the future.

userReviews.title: Overall, a very pleasant experience. A misunderstanding was resolved with excellent customer service and their commitmen
userReviews.positive: It was fresh, modern, and bright. The drive to downtown KC was a short one, but it was far enough to not be crowded by the busy hustle of city nightlife. The staff, and especially Erica, who worked at the front desk, were friendly and kind. She made sure our stay was pleasant and that we left on a good note.
userReviews.negative: The only complaint I have is that the first full day my sisters and I were there, we had two knocks on the door from housekeeping asking us when we’d like our room cleaned, the second time, we said to come back when we were finished, in about twenty minutes. But when we returned later, the towels were all still on the floor, trash hadn’t been taken, and beds were unmade. It wouldn’t have mattered if they hadn’t come to the door to ask us to clean, but since they did ask and then didn’t clean, we were confused by it. We talked to Erica about it and she explained the housekeeping protocol since Covid is usually by request, we didn’t know that early enough. To make up for it though, she offered complimentary refreshments for our journey, and talked with us at length about it until we were satisfied.
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Mobility/Hearing Access Tub

name: Candlewood Suites Kansas City Northeast, an IHG Hotel
description:
Situated across the Midwest Worlds of Fun amusement park, this hotel offers self-catering suites with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Facilities include an indoor pool and fitness center.
The air-conditioned suites of Candlewood Suites Kansas City Northeast feature a modern interior. All suites have a work desk, a DVD player, and a kitchen with a stove.
The 24-hour on-site convenience store offers light meals and snacks, and Kansas City Northeast Candlewood Suites is within walking distance of many local restaurants.
Candlewood Suites Kansas City Northeast also offers barbecue facilities, laundry and dry cleaning facilities, and fax and photocopying services.
The Candlewood Suites Kansas City Northeast is 8.5 miles from downtown Kansas City, 5.4 miles from Harrah's Casino and 7.3 miles from the Hodge Park Golf Course.

name: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Kansas City - Royals Stadium
description:
Days Inn & Suites Kansas City offers rooms with TV and free WiFi throughout the property. Arrowhead Stadium, home to the Kansas City Chiefs, is 9.4 mi from the Kansas City Days Inn and Kansas City Zoo is 4.5 mi away.
A 37-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels and coffee-making facilities are included in the guest rooms at Days Inn & Suites Kansas City. Each room is furnished with a work desk.Certain units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day.
A continental breakfast is served in the mornings at this Kansas City hotel. A business center is located off of the lobby. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.
National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial is 8.1 mi from Days Inn & Suites Kansas City, while Sprint Center is 9.3 mi from the property. The Starlight Theater is 10 minutes’ drive away from the hotel. Kansas City International Airport is 25 mi away.

name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Northeast
description:
Located in Kansas City, 1.1 miles from Worlds of Fun, SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Northeast provides accommodations with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness center and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk.
At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms include a closet.
Guests at SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Northeast can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the accommodation.
Sprint Center is 9 miles from SpringHill Suites by Marriott Kansas City Northeast, while Kansas City Convention Center is 9.2 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

userReviews.negative: We typically like Hampton Inns but this one had multiple issues. Our toilet flush would not work and my husband had to keep manually taking the lid off to fix it.  The towel bar fell off the wall when I took the towel off the rack.  We requested to have our room cleaned and had it put on the list the night before but it was never cleaned. We had to keep going to front desk to get new towels and had to set the old ones in the hallway just to keep them from building up in the room. We appreciated their response.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Kansas City
description:
Wingate by Wyndham Kansas City features a fitness center, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Kansas City. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located 1.3 miles from Worlds of Fun.
The hotel offers a buffet or Full English/Irish breakfast.
Wingate by Wyndham Kansas City has a sun terrace.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the accommodation.
Sprint Center is 8.7 miles from Wingate by Wyndham Kansas City, while Kansas City Convention Center is 8.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Near Worlds of Fun
description:
The Comfort Inn & Suites By Worlds of Fun hotel in Kansas City is less than one mile from famed Missouri attractions Worlds of Fun amusement park and Oceans of Fun water park. Amenities at this hotel include: Free wireless high-speed Internet access, Free weekday newspaper, Free coffee.
All spacious guest rooms offer a high-definition television with cable, a coffee maker, pillow-top mattress, microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. Some rooms feature a desk.
Morning Breakfast features eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including a choice of hot waffle flavors.
Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor heated pool and fitness center. This is a pet-friendly hotel, with four-legged friends allowed to stay for a fee.
This hotel is also convenient to the Ford Motor Company assembly plant, Bartle Hall Convention Center, Sprint Center, Crown Center, Arrowhead Stadium and Kauffman Stadium.

name: Holiday Inn - Kansas City - Northeast, an IHG Hotel
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Holiday Inn - Kansas City - Northeast, an IHG Hotel is located in Kansas City, 1.6 miles from Worlds of Fun and 9 miles from Sprint Center. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Guests can enjoy American dishes at the restaurant or have a drink at the bar.
The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms at Holiday Inn - Kansas City - Northeast, an IHG Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast.
There's an in-house snack bar and guests can also use the business area.
Kansas City Convention Center is 9.2 miles from Holiday Inn - Kansas City - Northeast, an IHG Hotel, while Kauffman Stadium is 10 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 19 miles from the hotel.

name: Motel 6-Kansas City, MO
description:
Located in North Kansas City, this motel is located off Interstate 435, less than 2 minutes’ drive from Worlds of Fun and Oceans of Fun.  Free Wi-Fi access is available.
Cable TV is provided in every air-conditioned room at Motel 6 at Worlds of Fun. Private bathrooms also come with a bath or shower.
A 24-hour front desk is provided at Worlds of Fun Motel 6. Other facilities offered include a vending machine. The property offers free parking.
Central Kansas City can be reached in 11 minutes’ drive.  Kansas City Airport is 16 mi away.

address.full: 3636 Randolph Road, Kansas City, MO 64161, United States of America

name: Aloft Kansas City Country Club Plaza
description:
Ideally located in the Midtown - Westport district of Kansas City, Aloft Kansas City Country Club Plaza is located 2.9 miles from National World War I Museum at Liberty Memorial, 3.6 miles from Union Station Kansas City and 4.5 miles from Kansas City Convention Center. The property is around 4.7 miles from Sprint Center, 7.4 miles from Kauffman Stadium and 15 miles from Worlds of Fun. Hyde Park is 2 miles away and Legoland Discovery Center Kansas City is 3.2 miles from the hotel.
Bartle Hall Convention Center is 4.4 miles from the hotel, while Historic Power and Light Building is 4.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Kansas City International Airport, 24 miles from Aloft Kansas City Country Club Plaza.

address.full: 393 W 46th Street, Kansas City, 64112, United States of America

name: Residence Inn Kansas City Country Club Plaza
description:
Residence Inn Country Club Plaza offers self-contained accommodations in central Kansas City, less than 1 miles from Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art. It features a tennis court.
Equipped with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, the spacious rooms at Residence Inn Kansas City Country Club Plaza convey a modern outlook. There is fully-equipped kitchen with dining area, a lounge and a separate bedroom.
Guests can prepare their own meal and enjoy a daily hot breakfast, served at the restaurant of the hotel. They can also benefit from the many local and international eateries surround the property.
Popular nearby attractions include Arrowhead Stadium and Kauffman Stadium as well as Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, all within 8 miles from the Residence Inn Kansas City.

address.full: 4601 Broadway, Kansas City, MO 64112, United States of America
